summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an expenditure, in an amount not to exceed One Thousand Seven Hundred ($1700.00) dollars, against the Water Fund of the City of Seattle, on account of the cost and expense of construction of water-mains in the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue et al by grading and the construction of concrete walks and water-mains, under Ordinance No. 19547, creating Local Improvement District No. 1879.
